p: Omori et al. reported a novel benzoxazole NPY Y5 antagonist to construct an SAR study to identify a hit for a lead compound suitable for in vivo study [ 148]. From this SAR study, the replacement of ortho trifluoromethyl (compound 43) caused a decrease in the IC 50 compared with the meta & para position-substituted compounds 44, 45, respectively and on the other hand the alkoxy substituent at the para position (compound 46) has improved the potency.
